topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53acc8116368722c1e700300#post_53acc8116368722c1e700300
Well within those parameters the answer would be a pornographic MLP universe so I would be quite well fucked figuratively and literally.

An answer more in keeping with the spirit that I think you meant by that question, well I'm still extremely fucked because that would be the Dresden Files universe and without even touching the big bads that means entities capable of turning me inside out and making balloon animals from my guts using only their minds, and also the sort who would do that for a laugh.

topics.body:
"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53acde736368724bf4810000#post_53acde736368724bf4810000
You know, I don't expect a lot from album artwork. Tell who the artist is and the name of the album, maybe give some sort of clear indication of what sort of music is being played and I'm good.

This album cover somehow meets all those criteria and yet still fails to meet expectations.
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7
